channel.title: Map bug and NPC bug
channel.description:
So i found an invisible fence. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97716126[/url] As you can see im floating in air. Its the part after those first few sentries you meet and that slippery part where 2 scientists say to not cross the beam. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97716039[/url]
And the NPC bug is on map bm_c1a3a If you hurry up trough the vent those 2 soldiers will not go trough the door they will just stand where they are and do nothing.

item.title: Map bug and NPC bug
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Already reported several times.
You should post “getpos” and “status” commands console output (as you should per reporting guidelines) next time you would be posting bugs like this so devs won’t have to decipher the exact location from the “location description” you provide.

Read full topic

item.title: Map bug and NPC bug

item.description:
So i found an invisible fence.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97716126
As you can see im floating in air.

If you hurry up trough the vent those 2 soldiers will not go trough the door they will just stand where they are and do nothing.
